u.a: <1w> leans over Ed . <1w> walks to kitchen .
<bef> walks to chair . <dur> gets on chair
<1w> leans over and holds out bib . <1w> stands behind Ed and puts bib on
<bef> looks at Mother , around . <dur> looks at Mother . <aft> looks down , around
smiles . looks at Mother , out , at Mother
<bef> nods . <dur> looks inside cup . looks at Mother
<1w> goes back to kitchen . <2u> walks to table . puts plate down in front of Ed . picks up cup and fills it
turns toward plate . pulls plate toward self . picks up cracker and eats
looks at cracker , out , at cracker
puts cracker down . wipes hands . eats
<1w> puts cup down on table and pushes it toward Mother
<aft> looks around , at Mother , at plate , out
<1w> puts milk on table . <1w> walks around table .
looks out . slightly points at Investigators . looks at Mother , out
